name: Roo.state.Manager

methods.name: getProvider
methods.desc: Gets the currently configured state provider

methods.name: clear
methods.desc: Clears a value from the state

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Returns the current value for a key

params.name: defaultValue
params.desc: The default value to return if the key lookup does not match

methods.name: set
methods.desc: Sets the value for a key

methods.name: setProvider
methods.desc: Configures the default state provider for your application
